meanings.sent1: The gogglebox in the living room is big and shiny.
meanings.sent2: I love watching movies on the gogglebox in the evenings.
meanings.sent3: The cat thinks the gogglebox is a magical window to another world.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the gogglebox, mesmerized by the colorful images.
meanings.sent5: The gogglebox lit up the room with its bright screen.

meanings.definition: A person who watches television frequently.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a real gogglebox, always binge-watching shows.
meanings.sent2: The gogglebox next door knows all the latest TV series.
meanings.sent3: The gogglebox chuckled at the funny commercials on TV.
meanings.sent4: She was like a gogglebox, absorbing every detail of the show.
meanings.sent5: The gogglebox's eyes sparkled with excitement as a new episode started.
